pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provides C++ API for handling Blizzard Entertainment's file formats of Warcraft III. Additionally, it provides a KDE-based GUI and OGRE-based widgets for displaying 3D graphics.

use.flag: Adds all provided applications e. g. "wc3editor" if useflag "editor" is specified, as well.
Adds map and campaign (.w3m, .w3x and .w3n) support.
Adds MDX and MDL (Blizzard model formats) support.
Adds W3G (Warcraft III replay format) support.
Creates GUI World Editor emulation as well.
Installs alls provided Qt, KDE and OGRE plugins (can be used without useflag "editor".
Installs Doxygen-generated API documentation as well.
